issues.description: The problem statement (UML and instructions) and the solution expect a constructor that initializes all five attributes in a specific order (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors). The template, however, contains a constructor with only three parameters (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents). This mismatch can confuse students about the required constructor signature and which attributes they must initialize.
